controller

Class ControllerBigImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.ControllerMain
      • controller.ControllerBigImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class ControllerBigImage
extends ControllerMain
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class is a controller that handles actions made by the user when in the "Big Image" view, i.e. the fullscreen view reached when clicking on an image.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class controller.ControllerMain

        appIcon, imgDataSplitPane, searchStage

      This method is called when a scene is created using this controller.
      protected boolean removeAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method is called when the user chooses 'Remove' from the file menu, and removes the shown image from the database.
      protected void saveAlbumAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Saves the image to a new album
      protected void searchAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method is called when the 'Search' item is chosen from the Search menu, and opens the search stage where the user can search after images using chosen criteria.
      protected void showBigImage(javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageView, java.lang.String path)
      Reinsert the image into view
      protected void viewAlbums(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method is called when the 'View Albums' button is pressed, and generates the album stage where the user can view their existing albums.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.net.URL location,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
        This method is called when a scene is created using this controller. In this case, it gets the path to the image the user has clicked on, finds the corresponding image, metadata and tags, then shows these in the "Big Image" view.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Overrides:
        initialize in class ControllerMain
        Parameters:
        location - auto generated
        resources - auto generated
